text: Hopea ponga is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is endemic to India. It is also known as kambakam (കമ്പകം) in Malayalam language. ==Gallery== file: Hopea Ponga 08.JPG file: Hopea Ponga 09.JPG file: Hopea Ponga 11.JPG file: Hopea Ponga 12.JPG file: Hopea Ponga 13.JPG ==References== ==External links== *Biotik Project Species Profile ponga Category:Flora of India (region) Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea ponga
